passive.name: ILLUMINATION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) ILLUMINATION
                                Damaging abilities afflict enemies with Illumination for 5 seconds. Lux's next attack or damaging ability against that target empowers Illumination, dealing 25.5 magic damage ((18 +  × 7.5) + 25% ).

q.name: (Q) LIGHT BINDING
q.description:
(Q) LIGHT BINDING
 9s   45/50/55/60 
                                
                                
                                Cast out a ball of light that roots 2 enemies for 2 seconds and deals 60 magic damage (60/120/180/240 + 70% ) to both targets.Damage to minions and small monsters: 90%.

w.name: (W) PRISMATIC BARRIER
w.description:
(W) PRISMATIC BARRIER
 12/11/10/9s   60 
                                
                                
                                Throws Lux's wand in a direction, shielding allied champions it passes through from 25 damage (25/50/75/100  + 18% ) for 3 seconds.After reaching its apex it returns to Lux, shielding allied champions for an additional 40 damage (40/70/100/130 + 28% ).

e.name: (E) LUCENT SINGULARITY
e.description:
(E) LUCENT SINGULARITY
 9.5/9/8.5/8s   70/80/90/100 
                                
                                
                                Creates a zone of light that slows nearby enemies by 30/35/40/45%. After 5 seconds the zone detonates, dealing 60 magic damage (65/130/195/260 + 55% ).Re-cast: Detonate the zone.

r.name: (R) FINAL SPARK
r.description:
(R) FINAL SPARK
 55/45/40s   100 
                                
                                
                                Fires a beam of light dealing 300 magic damage (300/400/500 + 75% ) to all enemies in a line.Final Spark ignites and refreshes Illumination.

example_build_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
example_build_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.
